topic.title: Preparation of Fixtures and Hoisting Attachments

header.para: Preparation of Fixtures and Hoisting Attachments

para.text: Confirm the following points prior to installation work:

li.text: Lifting fixture specific designed to lift Slim8n machine.
Check all attachments and accessory units with the shipping and packing check list.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-bottom:8px;
para.text: Table <%HMTABLECOUNTER2=1%>.<%HMTABLECOUNTER%> Parts to Be Prepared (Lifting Fixture)

para.text: The Lifting fixture can be provided by Makino Regional Office on request or can be purchased by the customer as machine optional equipment.
